title: Development of an Instructional Design System Based on an Integrated Training Design Matrix

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and experience with online learning environments
context.additional_context: Intensive 5-day curriculum where learners design educational environments using instructional design systems to strengthen job competencies, with hands-on practice using personal devices and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify educational objectives according to four training issues (scope, location, transfer characteristics, difficulty) using the ITDM matrix.
Learners can derive and apply instructional design elements (feedback methods, practice structures, etc.) based on analysis results with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can develop customized instructional design plans using organizational/personal analysis data and submit them in project format.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
